original_title: Ken Ham’s Foundations - One Blood One Race
overview: Understanding what happened at the Tower of Babel is key to understanding the origin of nations, “races,” prejudice, and much more! Ken discusses Charles Darwin’s destructive teaching regarding skin color, facial features, etc. On the lighter side, this video uses Ken’s comical perspective on poodles to teach on natural selection and speciation.
title: Ken Ham’s Foundations - One Blood One Race
